name: OracleIRC
tagline: Oracle IRC bot for #rapid, and usage of the RapidIRC plugin
body:
***

# Oracle

All of Oracle's command can be accessed through the following characters/phrases:
```
    ?[cmd]
    ![cmd]
	Oracle, [cmd]
```
The Oracle bot has a built in help-guide to allow quick access to any commands required. It uses categories to separate different types of commands. These categories are:
```
    ?help emotes
    ?help server
    ?help personal
    ?help other
```
## Emotes
```

```
